Simple Jekyll Bootstrap Theme

A Jekyll Theme based on Start Bootstrap's One-Page-Wonder

What is Jekyll?

Jekyll is a simple, blog-aware, static site generator. It takes a template directory containing raw text files in various formats, runs it through Markdown (or Textile) and Liquid converters, and spits out a complete, ready-to-publish static website suitable for serving with your favorite web server.

Find Out More

What is Bootstrap?

Bootstrap is a popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.

Find Out More

Who am I?

I'm a developer who needed to build aa website for a project using Jekyll and Bootstrap. I kept looking for something like this and couldn't find it - so I decided to make it! What's special about this version is that you don't even need to touch code to customize what this fancy page looks like. Feel free to re-use (with respect to the original designers' license). I also love cats.

Find Out More
